description:
If you have been seriously injured in an accident, it is important that you are represented by an experienced lawyer who has the skills to most effectively represent your interests. At Harbin and Burnett, LLP, we are led by a team of experienced personal injury attorneys who are ready to stand up for you. From our office in Anderson, we serve the needs of personal injury victims throughout all surrounding areas.

Our practice is focused in the area of personal injury law, which includes auto accidents, workers' compensation claims, nursing home abuse and negligence, and more. We offer comprehensive support for our clients. From the very first consultation until your case is concluded, you can expect that you will have a strong advocate on your side.

Skilled Personal Injury Litigators On Your Side

The attorneys at Harbin & Burnett, LLP, have extensive litigation experience. We thoroughly prepare every personal injury case and are ready to go to trial, if necessary. We have found that by meticulously preparing our cases, we are more likely to achieve a favorable outcome. Whether your case is settled through skillful negotiations or at trial, we are prepared to take all necessary measures to protect your interests.

Please contact our South Carolina law firm to schedule your free consultation. There is no risk in meeting with our lawyers to discuss the details of your personal injury case.
